snippet.title: Legacy Of Kain Soul Reaver [trailer 2]
snippet.description:
Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver, also known simply as Soul Reaver, is a third-person adventure video game developed by Crystal Dynamics and published by Eidos. It was released for the PlayStation and Microsoft Windows in 1999 and released for the Sega Dreamcast the following year. It is the second game in the Legacy of Kain series. Unlike the first game, Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, Crystal Dynamics did not develop it in conjunction with Silicon Knights and instead developed the game on their own. Soul Reaver is a sequel to Blood Omen, and subsequently was followed by three more games, one of which, Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2, is a direct sequel. In 2001, two years after its initial release, Soul Reaver had sold over 1.5 million copies worldwide.

More @ Wikipedia:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soul_Reaver
